Is there not something you can do.<br>it looks as if he went on your web site , made them, then is selling them,<br>But he is taking all the credit for the first one made.<br>and did you see the price of what the hack shack is selling for,<br>hate ebay myself<br><br>--- On <b>Tue, 12/30/08, M.A. Coletta (Mike) <i><michaelcoletta@...></i></b> wrote:<br><blockquote style="border-left: 2px solid rgb(16, 16, 255); margin-left: 5px; padding-left: 5px;">From: M.A. Coletta (Mike) <michaelcoletta@...><br>Subject: [EVP-ITC] A "Geek" selling raudive diode devices<br>To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com<br>Date: Tuesday, December 30, 2008, 3:46 PM<br><br><div id="yiv1817781643">





    <div id="ygrp-text">
            <p></p><p>Nothing wrong with geeks.... I is one.  Just thought I'd share something I found on ebay, today.</p>
<p>Some person going by the ebay name, thriftgeek is making and selling raudive diode devices similar to the one I put together.  Here's the ebay link:</p>
<p><a rel="nofollow" target="_blank" href="http://cgi.ebay.com/Like-Raudive-Diode-EVP-Paranormal-Ghost-Hunt_W0QQitemZ280297411931QQcmdZViewItemQQptZLH_DefaultDomain_0?hash=item280297411931&_trksid=p3286.c0.m14&_trkparms=72%3A1205%7C66%3A2%7C65%3A12%7C39%3A1%7C240%3A1318%7C301%3A1%7C293%3A2%7C294%3A50">http://cgi.ebay. com/Like- Raudive-Diode- EVP-Paranormal- Ghost-Hunt_ W0QQitemZ2802974 11931QQcmdZViewI temQQptZLH_ DefaultDomain_ 0?hash=item28029 7411931&_trksid=p3286. c0.m14&_trkparms=72% 3A1205%7C66% 3A2%7C65% 3A12%7C39% 3A1%7C240% 3A1318%7C301% 3A1%7C293% 3A2%7C294% 3A50</a></p>
<p>I guess if you want one, and can't make one yourself this link might be useful for you.  But, in case you want to make one yourself... here is my page with the diagrams of how to do it.</p>
<p><a rel="nofollow" target="_blank" href="http://www.ufogeek.com/mikes_diode_evp_device.htm">http://www.ufogeek. com/mikes_ diode_evp_ device.htm</a></p>
<p>- Mike C. (UFO Geek)</p>
<p><font color="#ff0000">Important Note: I don't sell any devices... so if you ever see something out there you think might be mine, it's not.  I do not endorse or sell paranormal products.  I just show you how to build them.</font></p>
